name: Glow-in-the-Dark Paint Pouring Workshop
description: Stimulate your senses as you play with glowing colours in our black light art studio. Let loose and express yourself in a fun and fluid way with this satisfying art technique. Embrace unpredictable patterns and create a piece of art as unique as a finger print. No experience needed.

name: Cake Decorating and Buttercream Flower Cake Class
description: This Mother's Day, come along to our masterclass. This class is perfect for the intermediate baker. We will pre-bake cake and pre-make buttercream for you so you can get to the super fun decorating part. This class is instructed by one of our very talented teachers. The best part is, you bring home a fully decorated, delicious cake that you will have created.

name: Master the Art of Ikebana
description: This Mother's Day, Miku Toronto invites guests to celebrate with an immersive Ikebana and dining experience. The afternoon features a guided one-hour Ikebana workshop led by renowned artist Aya Sugino, followed by a Japanese Zen lunch set crafted by chef de Cuisine Junnosuke Fujikawa. Thoughtfully curated, this event blends the elegance of Japanese floral art with the premium sushi Miku Toronto is known for, offering guests a unique and memorable way to connect with loved ones. Whether treating a mother figure, a loved one, or yourself, this special gathering promises a meaningful way to celebrate Mother's Day through creativity and connection.

name: Saturday Night Crooner Jazz Dinner with Adam James
description:
Adam James is a Canadian singer who is dedicated to sharing his passion for diverse creative expression, inspiring millions along the way. He began his professional music journey as a young singer with the trio Panache in Montreal.

Known for his deeply playful and engaging stage presence and songwriting, Adam has shared the spotlight with legendary artists such as Ray Charles, Tony Bennett, Liza Minnelli, and Jann Arden, as well as various big bands and symphony orchestras. His performances are marked by a unique ability to connect with audiences, drawing them into his storytelling through music.

name: Mother's Day Bottomless Mimosas Drag Brunch
description: Celebrate mom with flair! Join us at Pogue Mahone for a high-energy drag brunch filled with fierce performances, bottomless mimosas, and all the Sunday sass you need. Let's raise a glass (or a few) to the queens who raised us!

name: Stand Up Comedy Show
description: Presenting a stand up comedy show featuring MC Jay Peacock with comedians Heather Fudge,  Jimmy England, Christian Reimer and Larry Smith. Mature content is expected.

organizer.name: Lions club of West Hill - Highland Creek

name: Turtle Craft Day at Colborne Lodge
description:
Join Turtle Protectors/Mishiikenh Gizhaasowin at Colborne Lodge to get crafty and creative in preparation for the Turtles on the Move Parade on the land now known as High Park. 

Drop-in to learn more about our Turtle relatives and create Turtle puppets, masks, and signs with words of encouragement for Turtle - and then bring your creations to the parade on May 24, 2025! 

Gather at 1:30 pm and 2:30 pm to listen to Turtle Protectors share Turtle stories.
Materials, inspiration, and a space to get artsy are provided.

name: Toronto Maple Leafs Baseball Home Opener
description: Join the Toronto Maple Leafs Baseball Club as they take on the Kitchener Panthers for their 2025 Home Opener.

name: Music in the Museum at Gibson House
description:
The Tarafi Band
Reviving the energy and underground sound of Rebetiko, the songs and music of the urban working class from early 20th century Greece.

organizer.name: Gibson House Museum - City of Toronto Museums and Heritage Services

name: Mother's Day at The Cottage Cheese
description:
The Cottage Cheese is proud to present their exclusive Mother's Day menu, featuring a delightful selection of dishes crafted with love and inspired by the rich flavours of India. 

Spoil mom with a sweet treat! Chef Vikash's newest creation, the Gulab Jamun Churros, features a delicious golden dough soaked in rose-infused sugar syrup for a delightful twist on this classic indulgence! With its central downtown location and shareable, family-style dishes, The Cottage Cheese is the perfect spot for a memorable Mother's Day outing!

name: Mothers Day Workshop: Candles, Sprays and Floral Gift
description:
Join us for a hands-on, in-person workshop where you and your guests will create your own personalized candles and essential oil-infused linen & room sprays. Whether you're treating your mom, a friend, or yourselfâthis is the perfect way to spend quality time together while crafting something beautiful!

What's included:
Custom-scented candle making
DIY linen & room spray with essential oils
A special floral gift â from us to you!

No experience needed â just bring your creativity and a smile! Reserve your spot today and make this Mother's Day one to remember.

name: Eliades Ochoa
description: The Grammy Award-winning Cuban singer, guitarist, and songwriter, well known and loved worldwide as one of the original members of Buena Vista Social Club, performs songs from his new album Guajiro as well as Buena Vista classics.

name: James Ehnes, violin, with Orion Weiss, piano
description:
Two of the most sought-after recitalists on the international stage join forces as Canadian violinist James Ehnes and American pianist Orion Weiss return to perform works by Bach, Prokofiev, Vaughan Williams, and more.

Generous support provided from The Michael and Sonja Koerner Fund for Classical Programming.

name: Mother's Day Workshop: Candles, Sprays & Floral Gifts
description:
Join us for a hands-on, in-person workshop where you will create your own personalized candles and essential oil-infused linen & room sprays. Whether you're treating your mom, a friend, or yourselfâthis is the perfect way to spend quality time together while crafting something beautiful!

What's included:
Custom-scented candle making
DIY linen & room spray with essential oils
A special floral gift â from us to you!

No experience needed â just bring your creativity and a smile! Reserve your spot today and make this Mother's Day one to remember.

name: Motherless Day
description:
Mother's Day can be tough for those who have lost a motherâso we created Motherless Day, a gathering for connection and community. This ticketed event features activities like collaging, guided journaling, flower-pressing, on-site poetry, and a talk by Wendy Litner (writer of My Dead Mom on Crave). 

Guests will have space to reflect, connect, and honour their moms in a supportive setting. Proceeds support the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health, Canada's leading mental health hospital.

name: Community Environment Day at Rouge Hill GO Station
description:
Join Ward 25 and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: Near-miss Neighbours â Bologne and Mozart
description:
In Paris during the summer of 1778, Joseph Bologne, Chevalier de Saint-Georges and a young Wolfgang Mozart lived within a block of one another, and yet scholars have no evidence that the two musicians ever met. Seven years later they each published a set of six quartets: Mozart's are well-known and much beloved, but the Bologne works are only recently rediscovered. 

Lucky for music lovers, the Eybler Quartet has continued its exploration of the recently rediscovered Op. 14 string quartets of Joseph Bologne, pairing them with the revered quartets of Wolfgang Mozart dedicated to Haydn. This is a unique opportunity to experience one of Canada's best string quartets in an intimate and authentic setting.
image: https://secure.toronto.ca/webapps/CC/fileAPI/edc_eventcal/Copy of Eybler Quartet_photo by Aleksandar Antonijevic_92UVXSqlwQpJJ4eODbUH_g.jpeg

name: Mother's Day Bottomless Mimosas Drag Brunch  at The Goodman
description: The Goodman is turning up the glam this Mother's Day! Enjoy a fabulous drag show, endless mimosas, and delicious brunch classics in a vibrant, feel-good atmosphere.

name: Sunday Traditional Jazz Blues Brunch with Red Hot Ramble
description:
Red Hot Ramble performs traditional jazz, blues, funk, along with second lines in the spirit of the great city of New Orleans but with a distinctly Canadian flavour!!  Music that is as at home in a jazz club as it is a music festival or a wedding and yes, even a funeral!  

Red Hot Ramble is music about people, their ups and their downs, their loves and their hates, their blues and their celebrations of life. Guaranteed you won't be able to sit still when you come to one of our performances, in fact Red Hot Ramble is a much for dancing as it is for listening and singing along too.

name: Toronto Artisan Market
description:
Toronto Artisan Market is back in Trinity Bellwoods Park this summer.
Join us with your friends and family for a fun filled celebration of local and community.
Shop one of a kind handmade goods from up and coming Canadian Makers.
